timeline.body:
Rather than creating a new MT here (`getter.dropFirstParameterType`), can you just copy a subset of the originalMT's parameterArray?

Something like
```suggestion
		Class<?>[] getterTypes = getter.parameterArray();
		this.coordinateTypes = Arrays.copyOfRange(getterTypes, 1, getterTypes.length);
```

This still has one additional allocation (the getterTypes array) but saves the more costly MT creation
